import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faHeart } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import React,{useContext} from "react"; import "../index.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { WishlistContext } from "../components/WishlistContext"; import { CartContext } from "../reducers/CartContext"; const Navbar = () => { const { wishlist } = useContext(WishlistContext); const wishlistedItemsCount = Object.keys(wishlist).length; const { cartState } = useContext(CartContext); // Get the cartState from context const cartCount = cartState.cartItems.length; return ( <>
